description:
Lee-Leng finds out Kajika has gone to Raginei. He heads to Raginei alone in hopes of getting there before Kajika does. On the other hand, Kajika arrives at the airport and bumps into Carl. Kajika tells Carl that she arrived in the country without telling Lee-Leng. Carl proposes an idea to explain the situation to Lee-Leng when he arrives. When Carl steps out for a moment to pick up his bags, Lee-Leng arrives. Carl goes to Lee-Leng to explain the situation. However, the conversation is cut short by a sudden explosion.
Source: crunchyroll
